desc: SHA2-256 hash of some data
256 random bits
ECDSA Public Key, type 2 compressed
ECDSA Public Key, type 3 compressed
Hash256 of a PublicKeyRsa3072
SHA3-512 hash of some data
UTC time (secs since epoch << 64) when a signature was made
UTC time (secs since epoch << 64) when a record was made
UTC time (secs since epoch << 64) when a record is contracted to be recorded
UTC time (secs since epoch << 64) defining a time interval, or difference
UTC time (secs since epoch << 64) when underwriting shares are bound until
128 bit signed integer number of shares assigned
128 bit signed integer number of shares committed as underwriting
128 bit signed integer number of shares bid for recording
128 bit signed integer number of shares outstanding (recorded on blocks)
8 bit signed integer declares the state of shares (available, under contract, contract executed (assigned away), committed as underwriting)
16 bit signed integer declares the size of a list, as a check that all intended data is present.
16 bit signed integer declares position of an element in a list, used to check/correlate two lists with each other.
16 bit signed integer indicates the type of data contained in a value of a key-value pair
an RSA3072 public key
an RSA3072 signature
Shares Assignment agreement before signatures
Participant in a Shares Assignment agreement
Participant in a Shares Assignment agreement, compact (aka chain) form
An assignment plus a list of signatures on the authorization
Describes a record of shares when they were signed away in a binding contract
UTF-8 free text, no specific function, but recorded in the blockchain
Describes a whole block in the chain
UTF-8 free text, no specific function, but recorded in the blockchain
Uniquely describes a genesis block, includes list of properties used to calculate new blocks
All signatures include the time of signature
Reference to shares received potentially including info on their current state in the chain
A collection of lists of addresses for other asset organizers and recorders, references to shares, and unused keypairs
An ECDSA private key
An RSA3072 private key
A (hopefully matching) public-private key pair
A 2 byte type identifier followed by a DataItem
Arbitrary data, potentially lots of it
Contact information for an asset organizer (user software)
Contact information for a recorder (chainmaker software)
IP4 or IP6 or named network contact address, potentially including :port number
A full Genesis block, including superfluous identifiers (text, images) to help brand/identify it
A full chain block, including all data - though potentially censored as required by local laws
An ECDSA signature
Basic level of protocol, identifies functionality
Revision of the protocol, may indicate additional types supported
Short unique symbol that uniquely identifies the chain e.g. Tâ’¶1a
Text description of the chain
Image suitable for icon use to represent the chain
Large format image to represent the chain
Starting number of shares
Minimuim block interval time
Number of coins that the sum of all shares outstanding represents

An undefined data item, usually an error
